import React from 'react'; import Helmet from 'react-helmet'; // Utils import { WEBSITE_NAME } from '../../utils/websiteData'; // Images import Home01 from '../../images/logo avec script.png'; import Home02 from '../../images/home-02.svg'; import DonationsIcon from '../../images/donations-icon.svg'; import RequestsIcon from '../../images/requests-icon.svg'; import BloodIcon from '../../images/blood-icon.svg'; import Styles from './Home-jss'; const Home = () => { const classes = Styles(); return ( <> {`${WEBSITE_NAME}`}

Social Charities Platform ESI SBA

Give help to individuals,

Donations to our employees,

Medical Services to patients,

What does Social Charities provide?

Donations

Give donations to those in need of money, tools or resources

Requests

Add a request to benefit of our list of donations

Medical Services

Help patients in their chirurgical operations or medical treatment

Our mission

The main objective is to facilate the processing of requests and donations, Social Charities Platform attempts to make basic health tools , donations and services more accessible to employees in regards to their social and financial status.

); }; export default Home;
